title: Learning Research-Based Instructional Design and Pedagogical Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary education curricula and basic mathematics pedagogy
context.additional_context: Program focused on enhancing elementary school teachers' competencies in mathematics curriculum design and implementation, utilizing collaboration tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can systematically conduct mathematics lesson design processes by applying the Learning Study methodology.
Participants can diagnose issues in lesson implementation and derive improvement strategies through peer consultation and mentoring systems.
Trainees accumulate clinical experience by analyzing formative assessment results to measure instructional effectiveness and perform iterative improvements.

resources: Lesson design templates and assessment tools

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
